name: Pokken Ancient Legends
description:
Download the first official demo from here of The Legend Of Zelda FanGame game .

GAME PLOT

In this game you will have to try to defeat the terrible Nija Menace, which has returned after a hundred years !!

Pokken Ancient Legends is a game developed by Team Pokken that takes its cue from the games of the famous saga of The Legend of Zelda. This game is divided into three versions:

- VERSION FOR WINDOWS

-VERSION FOR MAC (APPLE)

- VERSION FOR NINTENDO SWITCH

It will officially come out on November 04, 2023 but will also have Demos inside that will be released before November 2023, the first on December 31, 2022 and the second two months before the release of the full version, or on September 04, 2023.

 

|| TEAM POKKEN 2022-2023
